reference.title: Defining the automated probe schedule
reference.shortdesc: Automated probe scheduling simplifies the process of scheduling probes. The start time of automated probes is distributed within a time range.

section.p:
To configure the automated probe schedule, click Configuration Automated Probe Schedule
Settings Automated Probe Schedule . Define the time window for the scheduled automated probes to start. These settings have no impact on probes begun in response to an event or on manually scheduled probes.
Start Time Specify the time that you want the run window to begin. The time is formatted in the 24-hour system in the time zone of your browser.
End Time Specify the time that you want the run window to end. The time is formatted in the 24-hour system in the time zone of your browser.
To change the Start and End times, click Edit, specify the new Start and End times, and click Save. To reset both Start Time and End Time, click Restore Defaults.
